content: उपजीव्य {%<ab>pot. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Affording a livelihood; <ls>Y. 2. 227.</ls> {@--2@} Giving patronage, patronizing (as a king &c.). {@--3@} (<ab>fig.</ab>) Supplying materials for writing, that from which one derives his materials; सर्वेषां कविमुख्यानामुपजीव्यो भविष्यति <ls>Mb.</ls> --व्यः {@--1@} A patron. {@--2@} A source or authority (from which one derives his materials); इत्यलमुपजीव्यानां मान्यानां व्याख्यानेषु कटाक्षनिक्षेपेण <ls>S. D. 2.</ls> --व्यं A means of subsistence.
